没有热量 méiyǒu rèliàng no heat
纯净 chúnjìng pure
纯净水 chúnjìng shuǐ pure water
热量的消耗 rèliàng de xiāohào calorie consumption
分为 fēn wéi Divided into
几种方式 jǐ zhǒng fāngshì several ways
第一种是基础代谢 dì yī zhǒng shì jīchǔ dàixiè The first is basal metabolism
躺在床上 tǎng zài chuángshàng Lying in bed
371 什么都不干 shénme dōu bù gān do nothing
这部分热量 zhè bùfèn rèliàng this part of the heat
维持 wéichí maintain
基本 jīběn basic
生理 shēnglǐ physiological
活动 huódòng Activity
维持的基本生理活动的 wéichí de jīběn shēnglǐ huódòng de maintenance of basic physiological activities
第二个是生活和运动的代谢 dì èr gè shì shēnghuó hé yùndòng de dàixiè The second is the metabolism of life and exercise
任何运动 rènhé yùndòng any sport
做家务 zuò jiāwù Do housework
381 日常生活 rìcháng shēnghuó daily life
第三个是食物热消耗 dì sān gè shì shíwù rè xiāohào The third is food heat consumption
进食的过程中 jìnshí de guòchéng zhōng in the process of eating
大概10%的热量 dàgài 10%de rèliàng About 10% of calories
通过 tōngguò pass
体温 tǐwēn body temperature
升高 shēng gāo raised
大概10%的热量会通过体温升高 dàgài 10%de rèliàng huì tōngguò tǐwēn shēng gāo About 10% of the heat is raised through body temperature
散射 sǎnshè scattering
周围的环境 zhōuwéi de huánjìng the surrounding environment
391 散射到周围的环境中去 sǎnshè dào zhōuwéi de huánjìng zhōng qù scatter into the surrounding environment
进食的过程 jìnshí de guòchéng the process of eating
这部分热量消耗 zhè bùfèn rèliàng xiāohào This part of the calorie consumption
避免 bìmiǎn avoid
没有办法避免 méiyǒu bànfǎ bìmiǎn no way to avoid
理论 lǐlùn theory
理论上来说 lǐlùn shànglái shuō In theory
途径 tújìng way
消耗途径 xiāohào tújìng Way of consumption
热量吃够 rèliàng chī gòu enough calories
401 超过你消耗的热量 chāoguò nǐ xiāohào de rèliàng more calories than you burn
体重顺利增加 tǐzhòng shùnlì zēngjiā Gain weight smoothly
上面 shàngmiàn above
上面几点 shàngmiàn jǐ diǎn the above points
精确 jīngquè accurate
（神经，精神，精力） (shénjīng, jīngshén, jīnglì) (nervous, mental, energy)
计算 jìsuàn calculate
精确的计算 jīngquè de jìsuàn precise calculation
热量非常难精确的计算 rèliàng fēicháng nán jīngquè de jìsuàn Calories are very difficult to calculate accurately
基础代谢 jīchǔ dàixiè Basal metabolism
411 上网 shàngwǎng go online
上网查一下 shàngwǎng chá yīxià check online
生活代谢 shēnghuó dàixiè life metabolism
效应 xiàoyìng effect

（估计，计算） (gūjì, jìsuàn) (estimate, calculate)
比较难估算 bǐjiào nán gūsuàn more difficult to estimate
手游 shǒu yóu mobile game
421 （手机，游戏） (shǒujī, yóuxì) (mobile game)
打手游 dǎshǒu yóu play mobile games

非常困难 fēicháng kùnnán very difficult

光看 guāng kàn only look
